items.title: Autonomous Pathfinding Engine
items.description: A high-performance simulation evolving 500+ agents to navigate S-curves. Implemented a Genetic Algorithm featuring elitism selection, crossover, and mutation to achieve successful navigation.

items.title: Nidoggr
items.description: A dual-ecosystem logistics suite for the Eurom√©tropole of Strasbourg. Built a Rust backend using Tauri for desktop operations, paired with a React Native mobile client to synchronize security data during city-wide events.

items.title: Esup Stages
items.description: Full-stack management ecosystem for the IUT Robert Schuman. Engineered to streamline internship tracking and pedagogical workflows, automating document sharing and corporate offer indexing.

items.title: Home Infrastructure & NAS
items.description: Secure, headless server environment focused on data redundancy and self-hosted microservices. Managed container orchestration via Docker Compose and established encrypted remote access tunnels.

items.title: Research & Development Intern
description: Built an automated pipeline for the acquisition and processing of satellite imagery via the Sentinel API and Google Earth Engine.
Trained classification models to identify and categorize agricultural parcels at scale.

Intro.title: Home
Intro.paragraph: I'm an IT student based in Strasbourg, France. I focus on building reliable tools, web platforms and exploring systems programming, with a particular interest in Open Source and technical solutions that drive scientific advancement.

About.title: About me
About.goals: One of my life goals is to build technologies that revolutionize the world and improve everyone's quality of life. I'm currently focused on improving my low-level programming skills, and my knowledge of system architecture.

About.hobbies: Outside of IT, I love music (especially Shoegaze lately), different sports (I love Cycling and Football) and reading (ever heard of Shadow Slave?).
